about_the_game:
Oranges is a clicking game.
Every 1 hour, you'll harvest a random orange;
Every 18 hours, you'll harvest a rare orange;

Features:
(1) Clearly, here, oranges are the protagonists!
(2) You can expand your collection list!
(3) Fun synthesis system, as well as an achievement system!
(4) You can join DISCORD or QQ to participate in discussions! (coming soon)
(5) You can also submit designs through the community!

If there's anything else you need help with, just let us know!
detailed_description:
Oranges is a clicking game.
Every 1 hour, you'll harvest a random orange;
Every 18 hours, you'll harvest a rare orange;

Features:
(1) Clearly, here, oranges are the protagonists!
(2) You can expand your collection list!
(3) Fun synthesis system, as well as an achievement system!
(4) You can join DISCORD or QQ to participate in discussions! (coming soon)
(5) You can also submit designs through the community!

If there's anything else you need help with, just let us know!
name: Orange

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K, 3.4GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G, 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K, 3.4GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G, 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements might change in the future

short_description: Orange is a click-to-collect game featuring a variety of rare oranges. There's no slashing here—just click away to collect them! Come join the fun!
